channel.title: Diein glitch
channel.description:
Hello... everytime on my server when i kill somone in wild they dont loose there items....... can u tell me how to make it so that when they die there items drop to the floor or w.e incase u need to no im usin project-peekay soruce and delta client...
Thanks
Kalvin
